scripts.docker:start: docker network create 2fa-net && docker run --net 2fa-net -p3306:3306 --name 2fa-container --hostname 2fa -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password -e MYSQL_DATABASE=2fa-db -e MYSQL_USER=user -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=password -d mysql:5.6.25
scripts.docker:start:m1: docker network create 2fa-net && docker run --net 2fa-net -p3306:3306 --name 2fa-container --hostname 2fa -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password -e MYSQL_DATABASE=2fa-db -e MYSQL_USER=user -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=password --platform linux/x86_64 -d mysql:5.6.25
scripts.db:dev:restore: docker exec -i 2fa-container sh -c 'exec mysql --port=3306 -h localhost -u user --password=password 2fa-db' < ./db_dump.sql
scripts.docker:clean: docker stop 2fa-container; docker rm 2fa-container; docker network rm 2fa-net
scripts.prestart:dev: npm run docker:clean; npm run docker:start
scripts.prestart:dev:m1: npm run docker:clean; npm run docker:start:m1
scripts.start:dev: sleep 20 && npm run db:dev:restore && nodemon app.js
scripts.start:dev:m1: sleep 20 && npm run db:dev:restore && nodemon app.js
